name: Lifeforce Acquisition Corp.
description: Lifeforce Acquisition Corp. is a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) focused on identifying and merging with innovative companies in the healthcare and wellness sectors. Established in 2021, Lifeforce aims to leverage the expertise of its experienced management team to create value for its shareholders by targeting high-growth opportunities that address critical needs in health and wellness. The company is committed to enhancing the quality of life through strategic partnerships and investments in businesses that are at the forefront of technological advancements in healthcare. Lifeforce's mission is to drive positive change in the health industry by supporting companies that prioritize patient-centered care and innovative solutions. The management team consists of industry veterans with a proven track record of operational excellence and investment success, which positions Lifeforce to navigate the complexities of mergers and acquisitions in the healthcare landscape. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, Lifeforce is dedicated to creating long-term value while addressing some of the most pressing challenges in health and wellness today.

seo.meta_title: Lifeforce Acquisition Corp. | SPAC in Healthcare and Wellness
seo.meta_description: Lifeforce Acquisition Corp. is focused on merging with innovative companies in the healthcare sector. Learn more about our mission and investment strategy.

faq.answer: Lifeforce Acquisition Corp. is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Lifeforce focuses on the healthcare and wellness sectors, targeting high-growth opportunities.

faq.answer: Lifeforce Acquisition Corp. was founded in 2021.
